title: Pros and Cons of Hole-Selective Self-Assembled Monolayers in Inverted PSCs and TSCs: Extensive Case Studies and Data Analysis
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02492C, Review Article
Peng Gao, Chi Li, Yong Chen, Zilong Zhang, Chunming Liu, Fengming Guo, Waqas Ahmad
Inverted perovskite solar cells (PSCs) have garnered increased attention, achieving a notable power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 26.1%, surpassing that of the n-i-p configuration. This significant progress within the perovskite...
